CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I'd be happy to help you identify the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph! Here are the entities I found:

1. PSFDTBT: This is a material name, which stands for "polysulfone-based fluorinated donor-acceptor-donor-backbone-thienylene-based acceptor."
2. PC71BM: This is also a material name, which stands for "phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester."

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph, after removing any irrelevant entities:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT - "Property Name" entity: Polymer Name
2. PC71BM - "Property Name" entity: Material Name
3. PCE - "Property Name" entity: Power Conversion Efficiency
4. V - "Property Name" entity: Open Circuit Voltage

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* Polymer Name: PSFDTBT
* Material Name: PC71BM
* Power Conversion Efficiency: PCE
* Open Circuit Voltage: V
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Property:

1. PC71BM - "Property Name" entity: Material Name

So, the only "Property Name" entity in the paragraph that refers to a Material Property is:

* Material Name: PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. "PCE" - stands for "Power Conversion Efficiency" which is a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell.
2. "Open-circuit voltage" - refers to the voltage at which the solar cell operates when there is no load connected to it.
3. "0.94 V" - is the open-circuit voltage of the solar cell.

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

PCE = 4.6%
Open-circuit voltage = 0.94 V
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the Property Value entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the value of material properties:

1. "4.6%" - the percentage of power conversion efficiency of the solar cell.
2. "0.94 V" - the open-circuit voltage of the solar cell.

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

PCE = 4.6%
Open-circuit voltage = 0.94 V

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Property Value entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.6% |
| 0.94 V |
